SEARCH
Package com.influxdb.client

Interface LabelsApi

@ThreadSafe public interface LabelsApi
The client of the InfluxDB 2.x that implement Labels HTTP API endpoint.
Author:
Jakub Bednar (bednar@github) (28/01/2019 10:37)
